comment: /**  * Return the correct aws s3 client (based on remote vs local).  * @param maxConnections max connections  * @return AWSS3Client  */
code: /**  * Return the correct aws s3 client (based on remote vs local).  * @param maxConnections max connections  * @return AWSS3Client  */ public static S3Client getAWSS3Client(S3Configuration configuration, int maxConnections) {     return configuration.isUseIAMCredentials() ? new S3ClientIAMOptimizedImpl(configuration, maxConnections) : new S3ClientStandardImpl(configuration, maxConnections). }
